misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni, a distinguished figure hailing from Hirsala Golf, is not only a seasoned competitor but also the primary organizer behind the esteemed Hector Trophée. With a meticulous approach to the game, Toni has carved a significant presence in the tournament's history.

Having graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée in all 11 past events, Toni's dedication to the sport is undeniable. His competitive spirit has led him to secure the coveted Hector Trophée on three occasions, a testament to his exceptional teamwork and strategic prowess. In addition to his success in the pairs format, Toni has twice claimed the Victor Trophy, awarded to the tournament's best individual player, further solidifying his reputation as a formidable force.
As Toni prepares for the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, marking his 12th appearance, anticipation builds to witness his continued pursuit of excellence and sportsmanship on the course.
